prompt:
Resume work on task-sync-controllers specification. Work incrementally with commits:

**THIS ITERATION - Complete ONE task only:**
1. Use MCP tool spec-workflow to check status: Call spec-status with projectPath='/home/rmondo/repos/wa-tools' and specName='task-sync-controllers'
2. Read the tasks.md file to find the NEXT uncompleted task (look for [ ] markers)
3. If you need guidance, use MCP tool spec-workflow-guide to understand the workflow
4. Implement ONLY that one task (or couple tightly related tasks in same section)
5. Make/update tests for what you changed (verify tests pass)
6. Run linter and fix any issues: `./vendor/bin/phpstan analyse app/Http/Controllers/GoogleTasksController.php app/Http/Controllers/TodoController.php --level=8`
7. Update tasks.md: mark the completed task with [x]
8. Commit changes with descriptive message (include task number and description)
9. DONE - End this iteration (next iteration will continue with next task)

**Critical:**
- Complete ONLY ONE task per iteration (not multiple tasks)
- Use spec-workflow MCP tools for status checking and guidance
- After commit, this iteration is DONE
- Orchestrator will automatically start next iteration
- Each iteration = one task cycle
- ONLY mark final completion checklist when ALL tasks are truly complete

Current completion detection: Check tasks.md for Phase 4 validation completion
